description: Pydantic schemas for authentication requests and responses, including data models for login, logout, token validation, and error handling.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Schema for user login request, validates Jira credentials including email, domain, and API token.

classes.name: LoginResponse
classes.description: Schema for successful login response, returns authentication token and user information.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: Schema for error responses, providing a consistent error message format.

classes.name: LogoutResponse
classes.description: Schema for logout response, confirms successful session termination.

classes.name: TokenValidationResponse
classes.description: Schema for token validation response, returns user information for valid tokens.

methods.name: validate_domain(cls, v)
methods.description: Validator method for cleaning and validating the 'jira_domain' field.

methods.name: validate_api_token(cls, v)
methods.description: Validator method for validating the 'api_token' field.

ctags.name: ErrorResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ErrorResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: LoginRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class LoginRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: LoginResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class LoginResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: LogoutResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class LogoutResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: TokenValidationResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class TokenValidationResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: access_token
ctags.pattern: /^    access_token: str = Field(..., description="JWT access token for authenticated requests")$/

ctags.name: api_token
ctags.pattern: /^    api_token: str = Field(..., min_length=10, max_length=500, description="Jira API token")$/

ctags.name: details
ctags.pattern: /^    details: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Additional error details")$/

ctags.name: email
ctags.pattern: /^    email: EmailStr = Field(..., description="User's Jira email address")$/

ctags.name: error
ctags.pattern: /^    error: str = Field(..., description="Error type or code")$/

ctags.name: expires_at
ctags.pattern: /^    expires_at: Optional[datetime] = Field(None, description="Token expiration time")$/

ctags.name: expires_in
ctags.pattern: /^    expires_in: int = Field(..., description="Token expiration time in seconds")$/

ctags.name: jira_domain
ctags.pattern: /^    jira_domain: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Jira domain if token is valid")$/

ctags.name: jira_domain
ctags.pattern: /^    jira_domain: str = Field(..., description="User's Jira domain")$/

ctags.name: jira_domain
ctags.pattern: /^    jira_domain: str = Field(..., min_length=3, max_length=255, description="Jira instance domai/

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(..., description="Human-readable error message")$/

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(default="Login successful", description="Success message")$/

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(default="Logout successful", description="Logout confirmation message")$/

ctags.name: token_type
ctags.pattern: /^    token_type: str = Field(default="bearer", description="Token type")$/

ctags.name: user_email
ctags.pattern: /^    user_email: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="User email if token is valid")$/

ctags.name: user_email
ctags.pattern: /^    user_email: str = Field(..., description="Authenticated user's email")$/

ctags.name: valid
ctags.pattern: /^    valid: bool = Field(..., description="Whether the token is valid")$/

ctags.name: validate_api_token
ctags.pattern: /^    def validate_api_token(cls, v):$/

ctags.name: validate_domain
ctags.pattern: /^    def validate_domain(cls, v):$/
